thread.title: 10 Times Bipasha Basu and Karan Singh Grover Made Our Hearts Feel Warm And Fuzzy
thread.title_full: 10 Times Bipasha Basu and Karan Singh Grover Made Our Hearts Feel Warm And Fuzzy

title: 10 Times Bipasha Basu and Karan Singh Grover Made Our Hearts Feel Warm And Fuzzy
text:
facebook 
Bipashu Basu and Karan Singh Grover have been one of the most popular celebrity couples, since they opened up about their relationship. The duo met while working together on the film, Alone , and became super close. People speculated their relationship status for the longest time, while the two just maintained that they were good friends. But last year, out of the blue, news of wedding preparations sent fans into a tizzy. And, finally, Bipasha and Karan opened up about their relationship. Last April, the two got married in a beautiful, grand "Monkey" wedding, and we can't get enough of their adorable love story. We also love how open they are with their affection for each other on their social media feeds. Here are ten times Bipasha and Karan's cuteness made our hearts feel all warm and fuzzy. When Bipasha showed that their friendship was the foundation of their relationship A post shared by bipashabasusinghgrover (@bipashabasu) on Aug 6, 2016 at 12:29pm PDT When Karan shared his true feelings for Bipasha, counting down to their wedding A post shared by karan singh grover (@iamksgofficial) on Apr 21, 2016 at 8:54pm PDT Seeing just how happy, and in love they were when they got married A post shared by karan singh grover (@iamksgofficial) on May 3, 2016 at 11:28am PDT Just them being their adorable selves, while on a holiday A post shared by karan singh grover (@iamksgofficial) on Jul 21, 2016 at 9:38pm PDT When they were just hanging out in matching pyjama sets A post shared by bipashabasusinghgrover (@bipashabasu) on Jul 31, 2016 at 7:23pm PDT And some more adorableness A post shared by bipashabasusinghgrover (@bipashabasu) on Aug 27, 2016 at 10:32am PDT The couple that exercises together, stays together A post shared by karan singh grover (@iamksgofficial) on Aug 12, 2016 at 4:57am PDT What's the point if you can't be goofy with the one you love? A post shared by karan singh grover (@iamksgofficial) on Oct 19, 2016 at 11:32am PDT When Karan showed his love for his baby girl A post shared by karan singh grover (@iamksgofficial) on Feb 15, 2017 at 8:02am PST When Bipasha gave Karan a completely unexpected birthday surprise
